Aravind Putrevu
Writing Archive About

I believe technology can help change human lives in a positive way. I'm passionate about helping developers succeed in their quest for building new things.

Oscillating between Bangalore, San Francisco Bay Area, and Amsterdam.

Now

Growing Dev Tools

VP of Growth at CodeRabbit. Scaling an AI-powered code review tool from early traction to market leadership. Wearing many hats across growth, engineering, developer relations, and brand.

2023-2024

Developer GTM

Advising founders on developer go-to-market strategy. Helping dev tool companies find product-market fit, build developer communities, and scale from 0 to 1.

2017–2023

Developer Advocacy & Experience

Spent 5+ years at Elastic as Developer Advocate. Spoke at 350+ events across conferences, meetups, and workshops. Built developer communities and user groups across India and Southeast Asia. Helped teams adopt Elasticsearch, observability, and search.

Earlier

Engineering

Built financial systems for real-time fraud detection. Worked on anti-virus and security software for enterprise datacenters. Wrote code in Java, .NET, and SQL.
